screen_desc: The screenshot shows a mobile phone browser with a pop-up menu open. The browser is on a Best Buy website, and the user is browsing Razer DeathAdder V2 products. The pop-up menu offers options like opening the page in a new tab, incognito tab, previewing the page, copying the link address or text, downloading the link, and sharing the link. The user can also add the product to the cart, compare it, or save it for later.
action_think: The user wants to add a product to the cart on Best Buy's website. The current screen shows the pop-up menu with an 'Add to Cart' option. The user should click on this option to add the product to the cart.
action_plan: click on the 'Add to Cart' button
action_desc: click on the 'Add to Cart' button
action_result: By clicking on the grey spaces located out of the pop-up window, you have removed the pop-up window, which is no longer obstructing your view of the product page. This action has helped you to continue browsing the product page and eventually adding the "razer deathadder" to the cart, thus making progress towards completing the user request.
